workspace.name: Races
workspace.query:
-- USE entity-services-examples-content;
SELECT Race.name, Race.wonByRunner, Race.courseLength, Run.id, Run.distance, Run.duration, Run.runnerName, Run.runnerAge, Run.runnerGender FROM Race JOIN Race_comprisedOfRuns AS r ON Race.name = r.name JOIN RUN ON r.comprisedOfRuns = Run.id ORDER BY Run.duration
-- USE entity-services-examples-content; SELECT distance, count(*) FROM Race.Run GROUP by distance ORDER by distance DESC

# Using database entity-services-examples-content prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> select distinct ?s ?superClass ?p ?o where { ?s rdfs:subClassOf ?superClass. ?superClass ?p ?o . filter (?s = <http://grechaw.github.io/entity-types/Race-0.0.1/Runner> ) }

(: : This Workspace contains reports and examples about an Entity Services scenario. : It's designed with simplicity in mind, not real business data. : Once you have run the Examples Loader ('../gradlew runExampleRaces') you can step : through these tabs to see what happened. :)

import module namespace es = "http://marklogic.com/entity-services" at "/MarkLogic/entity-services/entity-services.xqy";
( "Raw docs (1354 expected): ", count(cts:search(collection("raw"), cts:true-query())), "Non raw (1310 expected): ", count(cts:search(collection(), cts:not-query(cts:collection-query("raw")))), "Race envelopes (4 expected): ", count(/es:envelope[es:instance[es:info/es:version="0.0.1"]/Race]), "Run envelopes (1300 expected): ", count(//es:instance/Run), "Collection names", cts:collections() )

sem:sparql(' prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> prefix fn: <http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions#>
select ?s ?docUri where { ?s a <http://grechaw.github.io/entity-types/Race-0.0.1/Runner> ; rdfs:isDefinedBy ?docUri . } ', (), (), sem:ruleset-store("subClassOf.rules", sem:store()))

sem:sparql(' prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> prefix fn: <http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions#>
select ?s ?docUri ?xml where { ?s a foaf:Person ; rdfs:isDefinedBy ?docUri . BIND (fn:doc($docUri) as $xml) } LIMIT 2 ', (), (), sem:ruleset-store("subClassOf.rules", sem:store()))
